settings.review_message: "This product is the best I have ever used. Believe me, I'm 69 years old and when people see me they think I've had something done to my face like surgery."

settings.title: Fièra Luxury Concealer Benefits
settings.title_1: Doubles as a foundation for a radiant, even complexion
settings.content_1: Fièra Luxury Concealer conceals ALL signs of aging - correcting dark undereye circles and bags, discoloration, dark spots and redness as well as blurring the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. The full coverage formal gives skin such an even, radiant, youthful glow that most Fièra customers choose to apply the concealer all over the face for a fresh, flawless look.
settings.title_2: Never settles into fine lines or wrinkles
settings.content_2: Specifically developed for mature skin, our formula glides over fine lines and wrinkles to soften their appearance, without settling in them and exaggerating their appearance. While most concealers and foundations tend to find their way into lines and cake on the skin within minutes or hours of application, Fièra Luxury Concealer stays put, never creasing or caking - even after all-day wear.
settings.title_3: Improves skin over time with proven skincare ingredients
settings.content_3: While most makeup just attempts to cover up skin imperfections, ours is formulated with sodium hyaluronate (from hyaluronic acid) and collagen, two effective skincare ingredients proven to boost hydration and reduce the appearance of lines and wrinkles. Most women see an improvement in their skin’s hydration, elasticity and tone after one month of using Fièra Luxury Concealer on a regular basis.
settings.title_4: Shields and protects the skin with antioxidants
settings.content_4: Fièra Luxury Concealer contains natural and powerful antioxidants to protect the skin’s surface from free radical damage, and environmental damage caused by UV exposure and pollution. These active anti-aging ingredients are also proven to improve the existing signs of oxidative damage - such as fine lines and wrinkles, loose skin, breakouts and blotchy skin.

settings.tab_info:
Sodium Hyaluronate

The body naturally produces hyaluronic acid

Hyaluronic Acid, naturally produced by the body, plays a key part in the skin’s hydration, volume and plumpness. As with many other substances, we lose hyaluronic acid as we age. This decrease shows up in the form of dehydrated skin, fine lines and wrinkles.

Fièra Luxury Concealer was scientifically developed to combat this decrease by putting the sodium salt from hyaluronic acid, called sodium hyaluronate, back into the skin. Sodium Hyaluronate is able to hold more water than any other natural substance for deeper, maximum skin hydration. It is also known for improving elasticity and soothing skin inflammation.

Using Fièra Luxury Concealer on a regular basis over time results in my hydrated skin and a reduction in the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. This results in a complexion that looks more firm, plump, radiant and dewy.

  • High quality anti-aging ingredient recommended by professionals
  • Reduces dryness, the appearance of wrinkles and inflammation
  • Safe for sensitive skin and daily use

Collagen

Collagen is another super anti-aging substance that unfortunately decreases in the body with age. Among many other benefits, collagen is what keeps our skin from sagging and developing lines and wrinkles and helps maintain a plump, youthful appearance. By incorporating collagen into our Luxury Concealer, we are increasing the skin’s ability to hold on to moisture even further; and in combination with other effective ingredients, improving elasticity that causes that dreaded sagging around the eyes, mouth and jowls.

Not only does the full coverage formula provide a dewy, radiant finish instantly, but the active ingredients are working underneath to give skin that plump, youthful glow - even after the concealer comes off at the end of the day.

  • Boosts skin’s hydration
  • Combats sagging skin for visibly firmer, glowing complexion
  • Safe for sensitive skin and daily use

Haloxyl

There’s a reason why Haloxyl is called the "dark under eye circle" remover. It is one of the best skin-lightening ingredients on the market, helping to brighten under the eye where thinning skin and broken capillaries cause darkness and bags. It has also been the talk of the dermatologist community recently, as it has been proven to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

While it’s more often found in eye creams than concealer, Fièra remains committed to simplifying skincare for women over 40. By incorporating this anti-aging ingredient into our Luxury Concealer, it acts as an eye treatment at the same time.

Many women who had long given up on trying to correct or conceal their dark circles have now found THE solution with Fièra Luxury Concealer.

  • Brightens the delicate skin under the eye
  • Incorporated into a formula that won’t crease in lines under eyes
  • Celebrated by dermatologists as an effective anti-aging ingredient

Natural Support Ingredients

For superior results, Fièra Luxury Concealer’s formula contains a powerful combination of natural support ingredients to solidify results and get the healthiest, most gorgeous skin possible...

  • Vitamin C

    Vitamin C has many super powers. Most know it protects against free radicals, but it also works to promote collagen production, plumping the skin and reducing the appearance of lines and wrinkles. By inhibiting melanin production, Vitamin C also helps to correct hyperpigmentation and lighten dark spots for a more even skin tone.

  • Vitamin E

    Vitamin E is another potent antioxidant, among the best for protecting against free radicals and sun damage. It’s also known to assist in various kinds of cellular restoration and healing.

  • Glycerin

    A super-hydrating ingredient that acts as a humectant, Glycerin allows the skin to retain its moisture and also helps firm, tighten, and accelerate skin softness.

  • Lecithin

    An amazing emollient that restores hydration for a softer, smoother texture in the skin.

settings.title: Key Ingredients
settings.ingredient_list_content: Water (Aqua), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, VP/Hexadecene Copolymer, Cetyl Alcohol, Ozokerite, Phytosteryl Macadamiate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Retinyl Palmitate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Sodium Hyaluronate, Lecithin, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Tocopherol, Glycerin, Steareth-20, Chrysin, N-Hydroxysuccinimide, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, [+/- (May Contain): Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Ultramarines (CI 77007)].

settings.custom_liquid: Real Women. Real Results.

settings.title: Subscription Benefits
settings.info01: You’ve joined thousands of women who are seeing real results with Fièra Luxury Concealer and your journey to a radiant, even complexion has just begun. While you may have intended to use this as an under eye or spot concealer, you’ve tried it - and loved it - as an all-over foundation on the days you want to look your best.
settings.html01: Save 25% every month without the hassle of re-ordering
settings.info02: You love the immediate flawless coverage of the concealer every time you apply it, and look forward to the ritual every morning. You’ve begun to receive compliments from friends, family and even strangers wondering what’s different about your skin. You’re still shocked at the small amount you need for full coverage!
settings.info03: You’re noticing that your skin looks more even and hydrated even when you take the Concealer off at night. You may be noticing that the frown lines between your brows and/or your crow’s feet don’t look as deep. You now understand the importance of consistent, continued use for visible improvements and the prevention of additional signs of aging.

settings.title: FAQs
settings.html:
Where Are Fièra Products Made?

Our products are all proudly formulated and produced in the USA. Depending on if you order our concealer or some of our other facial care products, they were manufactured in either New York or Florida.

What Is Your Return Policy?

We have a 30-day full money back return policy. Simply mail the products to either address:

1) USA: Fiera Cosmetics PO Box 3335, Buffalo, NY, 14240-3335
2) Canada: Fiera Cosmetics PO Box 1212 Willowdale, ON, M3J 0L3

When returning any products please ensure to include your full name, and order number on the outside of the package. Your order number can be found on the packing slip or on the order confirmation email we sent to you. Please ensure the information provided is the same credentials that were used when placing your order. This allows us to associate the returned product with the appropriate account.

As soon as we receive the return, we will process the refund right away. All refunds will go back to the original form of payment. Once the refund is processed, some banks can take up to 7-10 business days for the refund to reflect on your credit card statement.

Customers are responsible for the cost of return shipping.

Can I Purchase Fièra Products In Retail Stores?

We made the decision to not put our products in retail outlets and instead sell only to our customers directly online. Retail stores take very large margins and charge a premium for the top shelf space. Consumers get promoted products that paid the most money to be there versus being promoted the products that deliver the best results. We let our customer reviews do our selling for us and instead of buying shelf space, we take a portion of every sale donate it to help feed people in need through our partnerships with Food Rescue US and Second Harvest.

Where do your products ship from?

We ship to our US customers daily from Buffalo, NY and to our Canadian customers daily from Toronto, ON.

When is my order arriving?

All of our customer shipments are fully tracked. On the next business day following your purchase, you should have received an email from us containing your tracking information. If you don’t see this in your inbox, make sure to check your spam folder.

What concealer shade should I order?

The color you choose depends on what you'll be primarily using it for. If it's especially for under eye coverage, we recommend going a shade lighter than you'd normally choose. If it's for other full facial coverage, we recommend choosing a shade closer to what you would use for foundation. We have customers who will buy two shades so they can go lighter and darker as they need to and use the two colors to blend.
Here’s a video that should help you choose the perfectly color for you.

How do you apply the concealer?

How you apply the concealer comes down to personal preference. The concealer itself is quite thick in order to provide maximum coverage so it’s best to let it warm up a little before spreading either on the back of your hand or between your fingers.

Once warmed, most of our customers chose to use their fingers to dab it onto their skin, and then use the brush, their fingers, or a sponge to blend it.

What are the ingredients in your products:

Concealer Ingredients
Neck Cream Ingredients
Finishing Powder Ingredients
Apple Stem Cell Cream Ingredients
Citrus Stem C Serum Ingredients

What is the undertone of each concealer shade?

Light - fair cool
Neutral beige - neutral
Medium - warm
Deep - warm
Dark - cool

How long does a tube of concealer last?

It depends on the individual, as some of our customers will use it primarily as a concealer, while others use it as foundation. Our product is formulated to be quite concentrated and therefore a little goes a long way!

Do you give samples?

Unfortunately, due to the high cost of shipping and packing, we do not have samples but we do however offer a full 30 day money back guarantee. If for whatever reason you aren't satisfied you can return any of our products for a full refund

Will your products clog my pores and make me break out?

Our products are noncomedogenic and have high quality ingredients like hyaluronic acid which is light, hydrates skin and doesn't clog pores, making it much less likely that you'll breakout.

What if I order the wrong shade of concealer?

If you are unsatisfied for any reason you can return your concealer for a full refund. Please refer to our Return Policy.

Does your concealer conceal scars, brown spots, age spots, under eye bags, sun damage etc…?

Our concealer is specifically formulated for mature skin to provide excellent coverage for various signs of aging and skin imperfections.

How long does it take to ship?

In the US we use USPS First Class Mail and in Canada we use Canada Post for all our orders. We ship our orders next business day and barring any carrier delays most orders arrive within 2-4 business days.

Do you test on animals?

Absolutely not! None of our products are ever tested on animals.

Does the concealer work for rosacea?

We’ve had a lot of positive feedback from customers using our concealer who have rosacea.

How long does the concealer last?

Our concealer has been specifically formulated for all day wear.

Will the concealer work for sensitive, oily and dry skin types?

Our concealer has been formulated to work with all skin types

How do I change or cancel my subscription?

Should you wish to change or cancel your subscription, you can do so by emailing support@fieracosmetics.com or by calling customer service at 1-833-693-4372. We will be happy to assist you with whatever you need. You can reach us Monday to Friday between the hours of 8 am - 8pm, or Saturday from 9 am - 5pm, Eastern Standard Time.

How and when will I be charged for my subscription?

The credit card you used for your first subscription order will be automatically charged at the time of shipping, and at the time of shipping for every future order, depending on your selected subscription. You will never be charged shipping for any subscription orders. The charge will appear on your billing statement as Fièra Cosmetics.

settings.title: 30 Day Money Back Guarantee
settings.content: We’re so confident you'll love our Fièra products we offer a Hassle-free 30 day Money Back Guarantee. If you're not satisfied with your purchase simply return the items back to us for a full refund.

settings.heading: Customers Who Bought This Also Purchased

settings.points: Fièra has partnered with two wonderful organizations - Second Harvest and Food Rescue US - to help fight hunger in both the U.S. and Canada.
Every purchase of Fièra Neck Cream equals one nutritious meal donated to a hungry person in need.
To date, Fièra has been able to donate over 1.1 million meals & counting thanks to these partnerships & their ever-growing customer base.

settings.title: 30 Day Money Back Guarantee
settings.info: Fièra Cosmetics is so confident you'll love Fièra Luxury Concealer that they offer a hassle-free 30-day money back guarantee. If for any reason you're not satisfied with your purchase they will gladly hand you back every penny of your investment, no questions asked.
settings.title01: 1 Meal Donated For Every Neck Cream Purchased
